title: varam taruvAi
sahitya:
varam taruvAi annaiyE vAzhvai uyarttiDa un tALil vazhaipaTTanai


anupallavi

  piranden karuNai vazhi tiranden kalai ulagil sirandu viLanga vENum suranden manadait-tETri


caraNam 1    anbaruL porumaiyum inba moozhi niraivum unparam enru eNNi unnai vand-aDaiya
kaNNum karuttum ena paNNum payanumena eNNit-teLindE unai nambit-turandEnayyE
    caraNam 2    vanappu mayilin mEl kanatta vINaiyuDan initta veN tAmarai sukhattil endanait-tETri
pATTu parAshakti nATTa jayak-koDiyai iLatta pOdu en karuttil irundiDuvAi
